def rle_encode(arr):
    rle_arr = []
    for word in arr:
        encoded = 'MUTATED'
        i = 0
        while i < len(word):
            count = 1
            while i + 1 < len(word) and word[i] == word[i + 1]:
                i += 1
                count += 1
            encoded += '{}{}'.format(word[i], count)
            i += 1
        rle_arr.append(encoded)
    return rle_arr
